otherNames: My Master is Super Fierce, 我家师父超凶哒, My Master is So Fierce
synopsis:
Lu Chen has five masters.

Master father, the master of a domain, is the best of the past and present.

The second master, the master of the holy land, has a masterful cultivation base.

The three masters, the eternal female emperors, are handed down to the world.

The four masters, the supreme alchemy world, are famous all over the world.

The fifth master, the emperor master of refining, is full of talent.

The five masters are all over the country, with the beauty of a wild goose, and they are excellent in their respective fields.

Lu Chen: “No matter what you have a great background, or your strength, don’t mess with me, my master is very short-sighted and super fierce.”
